item.title: BooneOakley
item.description: Ad agencies are outdoing each other in terms of clever uses of social media. BooneOakley's new web site is actually a series of YouTube videos with links placed via annotations into the videos to connect all of what we might traditionally think of as sections. What they create is something like a network of hypertext connections to hold together a concept of site—hacked together boundaries that create space within another larger space.
